channel.title: Yell for richscape, and smithing
channel.description:
1. I need a working richscape yell, none of them was working.
2. How do i make smithing? Someone explain the codes, like.. I know giveitem and stuff, but i mean, when i like furance do i need that object id, then tell it when i apply a item on it, it will give me that? Please and thank you.

item.title: Yell for richscape, and smithing
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Use packet 192 for smithing.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell for richscape, and smithing
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Add this ::Yell above ::Message

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 ) { String text = command.substring(5); yell(playerName +" ~ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Save And Compile,…

That will work,…

Read full topic
